name: Chart
shortDescription: Chart provides a set of frequently used chart types, and customization options.
description: ### Create the following chart with shape painter:
Dataset is a structure which contain 3 arrays.
[name] array and [value] array is a must for all types of charts.
[color] array is not necessary for radar chart and line chart.
**ShapePainter is set to NOT "clear the rendered image between each frame" to reduce lag.
So not suggest to redraw every frame.*
**Text object for label is linked to ShapePainter. "Take into account" when delete both objects.*

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Draw chart with shape painter. Specific dataset contain name, value and color required.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Chart

eventsFunctions.description: Bar chart horizontal.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawBarChartHorizontal
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ Draw bar chart horizontal with _PARAM2_ (label: _PARAM3_ center: _PARAM4_, _PARAM5_)

events.comment:
copy the whole dataset to internal varaible
"__Chart.BarChartHorizontalSideNumber" count the number of dataset name
"__Chart.BarChartHorizontalNextBarY" is the addup  of bar width and gap each loop, means no complex calculation.
the shape object move to specific layer

clear the chart last render image
set clear as no, so no need to redraw every frame
clear all linked labels text object
change bar color
if overrider is true, chnge line color to "BarChartHorizontalGridLineColor
draw bar

create label and reposition
update "__Chart.BarChartHorizontalNextBarY"
create value label at top of the bar
main axis (x and y)

parameters.longDescription: A dataset with a "name" array (string), a "value" array (number)  and a "color" array (string)
parameters.name: Object

eventsFunctions.description: Pie chart / Donut chart.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawPieChart

events.comment:
copy the whole dataset to internal varaible
"__Chart.PieChartSideNumber" count the number of dataset name
the shape object move to specific layer

clear the chart last render image
set clear as no, so no need to redraw every frame
clear all linked labels text object

parameters: PieChartCenterX + Object.X() + XFromAngleAndDistance((((Variable(__Chart.PieChartNextStartAngle) * 2) + (ChartTotalAngle * (Variable(__Chart.PieChartDataset["value"][Variable(__Chart.PieChartCounter)]) / Variable(__Chart.PieChartValueTotal)))) / 2), ChartRadiusOuter * 1.1) + (ChartTextObject.Width() / 2 * round(1000 * clamp(sin(roundTo(ToRad((((Variable(__Chart.PieChartNextStartAngle) * 2) + (ChartTotalAngle * (Variable(__Chart.PieChartDataset["value"][Variable(__Chart.PieChartCounter)]) / Variable(__Chart.PieChartValueTotal)))) / 2) + 90), 5)), -0.001, 0.001)))

parameters.longDescription: A dataset with a "name" array (string), a "value" array (number)  and a "color" array (string)
parameters.name: PieChartDataset

eventsFunctions.description: Radar chart.
eventsFunctions.name: DrawRadarChart

events.comment:
copy the whole dataset to internal varaible
"__Chart.RadarChartSideNumber" count the number of dataset name
the shape object move to specific layer

clear the chart last render image
set clear as no, so no need to redraw every frame
clear all linked labels text object
Draw grid outter shape, with fill color
Draw grid inner shape, grid line only, fill nothing
Draw grid axis line
draw the polygon based on value
draw data point

create label text
and link them to the chart shape object
add value at the end if true

update the label position
base on width of the text, concer position of the grid, and some extra spacing (radius * 1.1)

parameters: Object.X() + ChartTextObject.Width() / 2 * round(1000 * clamp(sin(roundTo(ToRad(360 / Variable(__Chart.RadarChartSideNumber) * Variable(__Chart.RadarChartCounter)), 5)), -0.001, 0.001)) + RadarChartCenterX - cos(ToRad((((360 / Variable(__Chart.RadarChartSideNumber)) * Variable(__Chart.RadarChartCounter)) + 90))) * (ChartRadiusOuter * 1.1)
